import React from 'react' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route } from 'react-router-dom' import logo from '../img/logo.png' import Blog from '../pages/BlogPage' import News from '../pages/News' import About from '../pages/About' import Contacts from '../pages/Contacts' import '../CSS/Header.css' class Header extends React.Component { componentDidMount() { const select = document.querySelector('.Header__lang') const allLang = ['en', 'ru'] select.addEventListener('change', this.changeURLLanguage) } changeURLLanguage() { const select = document.querySelector('.Header__lang') let lang = select.value window.location.href = window.location.pathname + '#' + lang window.location.reload() } changeLanguage() { let hash = window.location.hash hash = hash.substring(1) } render() { return ( <>
Главная Блог Обо мне Контакты
} /> } /> } /> } /> ) } } export default Header
